column4: Does anyone know of a good VPN solution? I want to access my 192.168.5.0/24 subnet at home from outside. What is the best solution?
those Yes, I am familiar with what you are seeing and that is the short term solution I am adopting now.
rag what do you mean where is kernel?
rag what do you want to do?
rag yes, UBuntu doesn't ship with the kernel sources by default
rag you will have to download it .. I believe the sources are called linux-source-$(uname -r) or something like that.
rag in gentoo you get the sources by default. Not so in UBuntu. You will have ot download it manually
ok , i have here linux-source-2.6.15 , but uname -r command return 2.6.15-26-386
